name: Pink Hour
description: Help a pink-clad office lady find a missing document so the boss doesn't get angry in this free spin-off minigame to Kero Blaster.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: 1.2GHz (2CPUs) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 256Mbyte DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 500MByte DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 20 MB available space

reviews.review_text: '...pink-clad office lady.'  I made it through health class, buddy. You're not fooling anyone.
Does everything a demo should, including being free !
I played this while waiting for dinner  10/10 would eat dinner again
Quite possibly the best propaganda in the world.
Nice little game! Only takes a few minutes to play!
Short but sweet, like a mini cave story adventure.
It's short, but fun.
Pink Hour is a fun short side scroller shooting game that lasts about 10 minutes.   Here's the full playthrough if you're interested.         YouTube™ Video:  Pink Hour // Playthrough All Endings

A 20 minute or less game, meant to be a little tease for Daisuke Amaya's title 'Kero Blaster,' for the price of free. Pink Hour isn't really worth your time as a stand alone title due to lack of content but it's also free, so there's that.
Pink Hour made me play for an  hour.
Pretty Cool Models Mdls is the best thing of the game jumping 1/5 mdls 4/5 dieing 2/3 Graphics 5/5 pixel 5/5         Would play again 3/5
this game is amazing!

I played this short game for YouTube, not sure what to expect.  To put it succinctly, it's a cocktease.  Granted, it's meant as a short interactive commercial for Kero Blaster, but it's still a damn nice retroesque platformer that's strangely reminiscent of  Kirby  in a way. The physics are great, controls and music are fantastic. I kinda wish this was a little bit longer, but it does its job (as capitalistic as it is).  It's definitely worth the five-to-ten minutes to play through.
This small demo/minigame made me excited for Kero Blaster, so i guess it's good
Very long gameplay indeed.  The graphic are cool. The main character is cute. Like a ♥♥♥♥♥. The story is simple like Harry Potter.  Overall, this can be amazing if it's slightly longer. 11/10 GG
Snack sized fun, worth playing through to see all endings. ^^
If you ever played the 'game' that was used as an ad for Bulletstorm, this is almost as good as that. It's somewhere in between a demo and an ad, and has some good, fairly easy platforming.
good game. its a very short game but is still a pretty good indie game

I would spoil too much of the game if my review would be any longer because it is pretty short, but a fun demo for the game 'Kero Blaster' wich was made by the same person who was responsible for the masterpiece 'Cave Story.' It is definitely worth a try. And if you are not convinced yet you can also play the 2nd demo 'Pink Heaven', wich has a little bit more to offer. This demo and the second demo are worth a try and they're also free.
It's a decent little nostalgia fest, but sadly it's much much shorter than I expected. I thought it'd be more than a single, easy, short level. But foe what it is it does well.
Sooo cute and it's fun. Cx

It's a fun little game, I think the hardest part is trying to keep the document from being torn up during the boss fight. 4 minutes to beat with the torn document and 4 minutes with the document intact.
It's cute, short, and feels like studio pixel. They know how to put together a game.
Pretty fun and cute! There isn't much to the game but it's free and only takes a few minutes to play, I don't see how you can give this a negative review.
Nice game
It was fun, but i beat it in 16 minutes! glad its free, because it was super short! but i have to recomend it because it was kinda funny and its free, even though its short
Sweet and short. This cute game is a simple platformer that really has no downsides to it. Not rushed in production: it's brief but well made.   What more could you want you want out of a free game?
Extreamly short, but was ok
Try the hard level! I'm sure you'll have a great time!
Short and simple gameplay! Fun and entertainning! The pink office lady is so cute! The only downside is that its really short!
a good game to kill time
Screams Cave Story nuff siad
great game, fast install, even faster to uninstall. paintball trainer has a better soundtrack
I thought I recognized the controls, graphics, music, physics, everything. Same developer as Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari), which was a great game.
If you like cute Pixel games try this one, it is quite addictive and ultra cute.  Controls are fine too! Music is catchy. Also, it is free, so don't complain ;)
It is a very difficult platformer but for the price, I would recommend this game for you to try.

A fun demo for the upcoming Pink heaven. The gameplay is simple, jump around and shoot stuff. Although it's only a demo, it still contains 5 endings! Like Studio Pixles' last game, Cave Story, which had multiple endings. It makes you play it more than once to see what the next ending is.

A cute little platformer, it's really simple: you can move around, jump (and slow down your fall) and shoot at things and enemies. It's an incredibly short game with a simple but effective level deisgn and awesome retro graphics and sountrack, since it's incredibly short and free I can't think of a reason for not having it in your library...
This game is so freaking adorable! It's very short but sweet and you'll fall instantly in love with the character. Very easy game for beginners and very simple but charming game.
It's free, quick download, it's about an hour of fun (if you go for the hard mode victory). Yeah, I recommend this. Nice music too :)
I really recommend this game it's really cute and short but i love it.
Cute game.
Very cute. If you just want to play something for 10-15 minutes, try this game! Two endings as far as I could see, unlocked hard mode. Didn't play hardmode.
if you dont try and speed run this you dont truly game
It's a relatively short game however has been highly enjoyable for the amount of time I have played. Also contains a great soundtrack.
Simple 2D game where you walk around and shoot stuff, that's about it. Not very interesting.

You need to play a gave for five minutes before you can leave a review. So I had time to replay this game a few times before I was allowed to make this. If you have 30 seconds to spare, this is a fun little game.
Not recommended.
I've been at funerals more fun than this.
